user_query: detail you knocked over three tons of cement still haven't recovered because they won't help us I can't just do nothing remember did you fix leak huh it's you again you are city inspector I am not an inspector you are inspector I'm a food inspector food upstairs come food inspector I panicked oh [Music] I don't mind see it's really tasty if you water it down there's camera we will never be watered down by you I've got this meet me at the beach and we'll make more sandbags he is panned I don't think this is going to work it might be time to tell him that I gotta shut down and destroyed his dreams you have no idea how hard they've worked how do you repay a sacrifice that big how can I say that I'm a mess I think you're even more beautiful oh look what your fire did to the sand come on [Music] here I saved this for you it's special you okay I'll take care of it you'll need to rest Ember I see a change in you always putting shop first I can trust you remember [Music] Ember you found it I'm getting really worried about my dad I haven't heard from her yet but she swore she caught tonight your family Ember oh I'm so excited to finally meet you meet the rest of the family [Music] hey everyone this is Ember hey that's my little said Blake and her girlfriend Ghibli what's up to say that you speak so well and clear we're talking in the same language your entire life can do oh my bad I'm all Whirlpool tonight foreign no you have to do something with that talent I told you you're special

entities.entity_description: Ember는 불의 원소 캐릭터로, 가게를 우선시하며 아버지를 걱정하는 인물이다. 특별한 재능을 가지고 있다고 언급된다
Wade는 물의 원소 캐릭터로, 식품 검사관이며 Ember와 관계를 발전시키는 인물이다. Ember에게 "더 아름다워졌다"고 말한다
Blake는 Wade의 가족 중 한 명으로, 여자친구 Ghibli와 함께 소개된다
Ember의 아버지는 가게를 운영하며 큰 희생을 해온 인물로, Ember가 걱정하는 대상이다
Elemental은 불, 물 등 원소 캐릭터들이 등장하는 애니메이션 영화로 추정된다

relationships.relationship_description: Wade는 Ember와 로맨틱한 관계를 발전시키며, Ember를 자신의 가족에게 소개한다
Ember는 아버지의 딸이며, 아버지의 가게를 돌보고 걱정한다
Wade는 Ember의 아버지가 운영하는 가게에 식품 검사관으로 방문한다
